# Contributing

## Setup
```
git clone git@github.com:esdoc/esdoc.git
cd esdoc
npm install
```

## Running Tests
Quick run tests
```
npm run test
```

You can see output documentation after runt tests.
```
# see http://localhost:8080/test/fixture/dest/esdoc
npm run start
```

## Install From Head
Install ESDoc from head revision.

```
npm install -g ./
esdoc -h
```
